Topic.Title: How long does it take to have your game categorized? And what does that let you do?

Posts.EditableText: I've been waiting a few days for my game to be categorized.  How long does it usually take? I saw someone's game that hasn't been categorized for months! Also, what does being categorized let you do? Can people not see your game until it's categorized? If a moderator is reading this, please categorize my game and others or give us a realistic date. Thank you.
Posts.HTML: I've been waiting a few days for my game to be categorized. How long does it usually take? I saw someone's game that hasn't been categorized for months! Also, what does being categorized let you do? Can people not see your game until it's categorized? If a moderator is reading this, please categorize my game and others or give us a realistic date. Thank you.

Posts.EditableText: Unfortunately, there are not very many active moderators on here. It seems like the owners are gradually abandoning ship. I looked at your story and left you a comment.
Posts.HTML: Unfortunately, there are not very many active moderators on here. It seems like the owners are gradually abandoning ship. I looked at your story and left you a comment.

Posts.EditableText: Thanks, I looked at it! Also, how do you become a moderator? Thanks!
Posts.HTML: Thanks, I looked at it! Also, how do you become a moderator? Thanks!

Posts.EditableText: If you move your game to Sandpit category, it gets automatically approved...
Posts.HTML: If you move your game to Sandpit category, it gets automatically approved...

Posts.EditableText: I'd love to pitch in and help with categorisation when I can. It took my first game about two weeks to get catergorised in November 2020.
Posts.HTML: I'd love to pitch in and help with categorisation when I can. It took my first game about two weeks to get catergorised in November 2020.

Posts.EditableText: Also, if you move the game to the Work In Progress category, it gets approved.
Posts.HTML: Also, if you move the game to the Work In Progress category, it gets approved.
